@narendramodi @RBI @narendramodi 

Thankful for precautions taken for #coronavirus 

Same way  initiate revival plan for #PMCBankCrisis we are suffering since 6 months with no revival plan @uddhavthackeray @nsitharaman @supriya_sule @RBI

Bring revival plan for depositors  https://t.co/HzUzx2Xdt3
